name: Happy Days
summary_text: The Cunningham family live through the 1950s with help and guidance from the lovable and almost superhuman greaser, Fonzie.

name: The Invitation
summary_text: A man accepts an invitation to a dinner party hosted by his ex-wife, an unsettling affair that reopens old wounds and creates new tensions.

name: The Bone Collector
summary_text: A quadriplegic ex-homicide detective and his partner try to track down a serial killer who is terrorizing New York City.

name: Triple 9
summary_text: A gang of criminals and corrupt cops plan the murder of a police officer in order to pull off their biggest heist yet across town.

name: Let Him Go
summary_text: A retired sheriff and his wife, grieving over the death of their son, set out to find their only grandson.

name: Dolittle
summary_text: A physician who can talk to animals embarks on an adventure to find a legendary island with a young apprentice and a crew of strange pets.

name: Radhe
summary_text: After taking the dreaded gangster Gani Bhai, ACP Rajveer Shikawat aka Radhe goes on a manhunt to find the wealthiest man of the town secretly running a crime syndicate.

name: Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery
summary_text: A world-class playboy and part-time secret agent from the 1960s emerges after thirty years in a cryogenic state to battle with his nemesis Dr. Evil.

name: Ms. Marvel
summary_text: New Jersey raised Kamala Khan learns she has polymorphous powers.

name: Falling Down
summary_text: An ordinary man frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.

name: High Fidelity
summary_text: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

name: Together Together
summary_text: When a young loner becomes the gestational surrogate for a single man in his 40s, the two strangers come to realize this unexpected relationship will challenge their perceptions of connection, boundaries and the particulars of love.

name: Matchstick Men
summary_text: A phobic con artist and his protégé are on the verge of pulling off a lucrative swindle when the former's teenage daughter arrives unexpectedly.

name: Contagion
summary_text: Healthcare professionals, government officials and everyday people find themselves in the midst of a pandemic as the CDC works to find a cure.

name: Sweet & Sour
summary_text: Faced with real-world opportunities and challenges, a couple endures the highs and lows of trying to make a long-distance relationship survive.

name: Rurôni Kenshin: Sai shûshô - The Beginning
summary_text: Kenshin Himura goes up against a mysterious weapons dealer named Enishi Yukishiro. He controls the underworld of China. The secret of Kenshin Himura's "Jujishou" is also revealed.

name: Loudermilk
summary_text: Centers on Sam Loudermilk, a recovering alcoholic and substance abuse counselor with a bad attitude. Although he has his drinking under control, Loudermilk discovers that when your life is a mess, getting clean is the easy part.

name: Vivarium
summary_text: A young couple looking for the perfect home find themselves trapped in a mysterious labyrinth-like neighborhood of identical houses.

name: The Visit
summary_text: Two siblings become increasingly frightened by their grandparents' disturbing behavior while visiting them on vacation.

name: The Deep Ones
summary_text: A married couple rents a beach side Airbnb only to be surrounded by peculiar neighbors and occurrences. They soon discover to be in the grips of a mysterious cult and their ancient sea god.

name: The Gray Man
summary_text: In Europe, a CIA operative-turned-assassin looks to evade mysterious forces as he tries to save the lives of the daughters who don't know he exists.

name: Shallow Hal
summary_text: A shallow man falls in love with a 300-pound woman because of her inner beauty.

name: The Place Beyond the Pines
summary_text: A motorcycle stunt rider turns to robbing banks as a way to provide for his lover and their newborn child, a decision that puts him on a collision course with an ambitious rookie cop navigating a department ruled by a corrupt detective.

name: Riviera
summary_text: A woman discovers her family's lifestyle has been funded by blood and seeks to protect herself and her loved ones.

name: As Good as It Gets
summary_text: A single mother and waitress, a misanthropic author, and a gay artist form an unlikely friendship after the artist is assaulted in a robbery.

name: The Sitter
summary_text: A college student on suspension is coaxed into babysitting the kids next door, though he is fully unprepared for the wild night ahead of him.

name: He-Man and the Masters of the Universe
summary_text: The most powerful man in the universe, He-Man, goes against the evil forces of Skeletor to save the planet Eternia and to protect the secrets of Castle Grayskull.

name: Cannibal Holocaust
summary_text: During a rescue mission into the Amazon rainforest, a professor stumbles across lost film shot by a missing documentary crew.

name: Sabrina the Teenage Witch
summary_text: When a sixteen-year-old high school student finds out she's a witch, her two aunts offer guidance on how to control her newly-discovered magical powers.

name: Couples Retreat
summary_text: A comedy centered around four couples who settle into a tropical-island resort for a vacation. While one of the couples is there to work on the marriage, the others fail to realize that participation in the resort's therapy sessions is not optional.

name: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
summary_text: A reality series that follows some of the most affluent women in the country as they enjoy the lavish lifestyle that only Beverly Hills can provide.

name: Kung Fu Panda
summary_text: The Dragon Warrior has to clash against the savage Tai Lung as China's fate hangs in the balance. However, the Dragon Warrior mantle is supposedly mistaken to be bestowed upon an obese panda who is a novice in martial arts.

name: Power Book II: Ghost
summary_text: The journey of some of Power's most controversial characters.

name: The Silencing
summary_text: A reformed hunter living in isolation on a wildlife sanctuary becomes involved in a deadly game of cat and mouse when he and the local Sheriff set out to track a vicious killer who may have kidnapped his daughter years ago.

name: Quantum of Solace
summary_text: James Bond descends into mystery as he tries to stop a mysterious organisation from eliminating a country's most valuable resource.

name: Lie with Me
summary_text: An outgoing, sexually aggressive young woman meets and begins a torrid affair with an equally aggressive young man in which their affair begins to bring a strain on their personal lives.

name: Riddick
summary_text: Left for dead on a sun-scorched planet, Riddick finds himself up against an alien race of predators. Activating an emergency beacon alerts two ships: one carrying a new breed of mercenary, the other captained by a man from Riddick's past.

name: Leverage: Redemption
summary_text: The Hitter, the Hacker, the Grifter and the Thief are back, this time with help from a new tech genius and corporate fixer, to take on a new kind of villain. When someone needs help, they provide...Leverage.

name: The Whole Truth
summary_text: A defense attorney works to get his teenage client acquitted of murdering his wealthy father.

name: Snowden
summary_text: The NSA's illegal surveillance techniques are leaked to the public by one of the agency's employees, Edward Snowden, in the form of thousands of classified documents distributed to the press.

name: Alone
summary_text: A recently widowed traveler is kidnapped by a cold blooded killer, only to escape into the wilderness where she is forced to battle against the elements as her pursuer closes in on her.

name: The White Lotus
summary_text: Set in a tropical resort, it follows the exploits of various guests and employees over the span of a week.

name: The Mask
summary_text: Bank clerk Stanley Ipkiss is transformed into a manic superhero when he wears a mysterious mask.

name: Constantine
summary_text: Supernatural exorcist and demonologist John Constantine helps a policewoman prove her sister's death was not a suicide, but something more.

name: The Peanut Butter Falcon
summary_text: Zak runs away from his care home to make his dream of becoming a wrestler come true.

name: The Doors
summary_text: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band The Doors and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

name: The Fugitive
summary_text: Dr. Richard Kimble, unjustly accused of murdering his wife, must find the real killer while being the target of a nationwide manhunt led by a seasoned U.S. Marshal.
A Kansas family relocates to Beverly Hills, where their two children adapt to the infamous social drama of West Beverly Hills High.

name: Striptease
summary_text: A stripper and single mother gets dragged into a dangerous situation after a congressman takes a fancy to her.

name: Benidorm
summary_text: British comedy series following holidaymakers at the Solana Resort in Benidorm. Hilarity ensues as guests try to get value for their Euros.

name: A Bridge Too Far
summary_text: Operation Market Garden, September 1944: The Allies attempt to capture several strategically important bridges in the Netherlands in the hope of breaking the German lines.

name: The Da Vinci Code
summary_text: A murder inside the Louvre, and clues in Da Vinci paintings, lead to the discovery of a religious mystery protected by a secret society for two thousand years, which could shake the foundations of Christianity.

name: Shooter
summary_text: A conspiracy thriller that follows the journey of Bob Lee Swagger, a highly-decorated veteran who is coaxed back into action to prevent a plot to kill the President.

name: The Emperor's New Groove
summary_text: Emperor Kuzco is turned into a llama by his ex-administrator Yzma, and must now regain his throne with the help of Pacha, the gentle llama herder.

name: Days of Our Lives
summary_text: A chronicle of the lives, loves, trials and tribulations of the citizens of the fictional city of Salem.

name: Ghostbusters II
summary_text: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.

name: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
summary_text: When New York is put under siege by Oscorp, it is up to Spider-Man to save the city he swore to protect as well as his loved ones.

name: Y Tu Mamá También
summary_text: In Mexico, two teenage boys and an attractive older woman embark on a road trip and learn a thing or two about life, friendship, sex, and each other.

name: The Pelican Brief
summary_text: A law student uncovers a conspiracy, putting herself and others in danger.

name: The Wailing
summary_text: Soon after a stranger arrives in a little village, a mysterious sickness starts spreading. A policeman, drawn into the incident, is forced to solve the mystery in order to save his daughter.

name: The Dressmaker
summary_text: A glamorous woman returns to her small town in rural Australia. With her sewing machine and haute couture style, she transforms the women and exacts sweet revenge on those who did her wrong.

name: How to Train Your Dragon
summary_text: A hapless young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.

name: She's the Man
summary_text: When her brother decides to ditch for a couple weeks, Viola heads over to his elite boarding school, disguised as him, and proceeds to fall for his school's star soccer player, and soon learns she's not the only one with romantic troubles.

name: Outside the Wire
summary_text: In the near future, a drone pilot sent into a war zone finds himself paired with a top-secret android officer on a mission to stop a nuclear attack.

name: The Counselor
summary_text: A lawyer finds himself in over his head when he gets involved in drug trafficking.

name: The Giver
summary_text: In a seemingly perfect community, without war, pain, suffering, differences or choice, a young boy is chosen to learn from an elderly man about the true pain and pleasure of the "real" world.

name: Robin Hood: Men in Tights
summary_text: A spoof of Robin Hood in general, and Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves (1991) in particular.

name: The Wrong Missy
summary_text: Tim thinks he's invited the woman of his dreams on a work retreat to Hawaii, realizing too late he mistakenly texted someone from a nightmare blind date.

name: My Three Sons
summary_text: Widower Steve Douglas raises three sons with the help of his father-in-law, and is later aided by the boys' great-uncle. An adopted son, a stepdaughter, wives, and another generation of sons join the loving family in later seasons.

name: Dragon Ball Z
summary_text: After learning that he is from another planet, a warrior named Goku and his friends are prompted to defend it from an onslaught of extraterrestrial enemies.

name: The Americanization of Emily
summary_text: An American Naval Officer's talent for living the good life in wartime is challenged when he falls in love and is sent on a dangerous mission.

name: All Ladies Do It
summary_text: A happily married 24-year-old woman who experiences an inexplicable, rather restless craving to finally live her life intensely, retells her extra-marital escapades to her husband intending to spice up their marriage.

name: I Saw the Light
summary_text: The story of the country-western singer Hank Williams, who in his brief life created one of the greatest bodies of work in American music. The film chronicles his rise to fame and its tragic effect on his health and personal life.

name: The Stand
summary_text: After a deadly plague kills most of the world's population, the remaining survivors split into two groups - one led by a benevolent elder and the other by a malevolent being - to face each other in a final battle between good and evil.

name: Gone Baby Gone
summary_text: Two Boston area detectives investigate a little girl's kidnapping, which ultimately turns into a crisis both professionally and personally.

name: Abraham Lincoln: Vampire Hunter
summary_text: Abraham Lincoln, the 16th President of the United States, discovers vampires are planning to take over the United States. He makes it his mission to eliminate them.

name: Natural Born Killers
summary_text: Two victims of traumatized childhoods become lovers and psychopathic serial murderers irresponsibly glorified by the mass media.

name: Lethal Weapon
summary_text: A slightly unhinged cop is partnered with a veteran detective trying to maintain a low stress level in his life.

name: The Map of Tiny Perfect Things
summary_text: Two teens who live the same day repeatedly, enabling them to create the titular map.

name: Black Adam
summary_text: Plot unknown. A spin-off from 'Shazam!' centering on the film's anti-hero, Black Adam.

name: Brothers & Sisters
summary_text: The story of the drama surrounding a family's adult siblings.

name: The Lost City of Z
summary_text: A true-life drama, centering on British explorer Major Percival Fawcett, who disappeared whilst searching for a mysterious city in the Amazon in the 1920s.

name: The Magnificent Seven
summary_text: Seven gunfighters are hired by Mexican peasants to liberate their village from oppressive bandits.

name: The Boy Next Door
summary_text: A woman, separated from her unfaithful husband, falls for a younger man who has moved in next door, but their torrid affair soon takes a dangerous turn.

name: Remember the Titans
summary_text: The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.

name: Upgrade
summary_text: Set in the near-future, technology controls nearly all aspects of life. But when the world of Grey, a self-labeled technophobe, is turned upside down, his only hope for revenge is an experimental computer chip implant.

name: Ghost Whisperer
summary_text: A newlywed with the ability to communicate with the earthbound spirits of the recently deceased overcomes skepticism and doubt to help send their important messages to the living and allow the dead to pass on to the other side.

name: Despicable Me
summary_text: When a criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, he finds their love is profoundly changing him for the better.

name: 47 Ronin
summary_text: A band of samurai set out to avenge the death and dishonor of their master at the hands of a ruthless shogun.

name: Lara Croft: Tomb Raider
summary_text: Video game adventurer Lara Croft comes to life in a movie where she races against time and villains to recover powerful ancient artifacts.

name: Showgirls
summary_text: Nomi, a young drifter, arrives in Las Vegas to become a dancer and soon sets about clawing and pushing her way to become the top of the Vegas showgirls.

name: The Happening
summary_text: A science teacher, his wife, and a young girl struggle to survive a plague that causes those infected to commit suicide.

name: The Craft: Legacy
summary_text: A group of high school students form a coven of witches.

name: Babylon 5
summary_text: In the mid 23rd century, the Earth Alliance space station Babylon 5, located in neutral territory, is a major focal point for political intrigue, racial tensions and various wars over the course of five years.

name: Downfall
summary_text: Traudl Junge, the final secretary for Adolf Hitler, tells of the Nazi dictator's final days in his Berlin bunker at the end of WWII.

name: In the Heart of the Sea
summary_text: A recounting of a New England whaling ship's sinking by a giant whale in 1820, an experience that later inspired the great novel Moby-Dick.

name: Insecure
summary_text: Follows the awkward experiences and racy tribulations of a modern-day African-American woman.

name: Regular Show
summary_text: The daily surreal adventures of a blue jay and raccoon duo that attempt to deal with their mundane jobs as groundskeepers at the local park.

name: Ad Astra
summary_text: Astronaut Roy McBride undertakes a mission across an unforgiving solar system to uncover the truth about his missing father and his doomed expedition that now, 30 years later, threatens the universe.

name: The Longest Yard
summary_text: Prison inmates form a football team to challenge the prison guards.

name: Shaadisthan
summary_text: Mumbai to Ajmer, a squabbling family, a band, and clashing values. Along the roads of friendship and life, this journey only gets crazier.

name: Batman Returns
summary_text: While Batman deals with a deformed man calling himself the Penguin wreaking havoc across Gotham with the help of a cruel businessman, a female employee of the latter becomes the Catwoman with her own vendetta.

name: Close Enough
summary_text: A comedic look on a couple facing various challenges in their daily lives while trying to cope with their changes from twenties to thirties.

name: The War with Grandpa
summary_text: Upset that he has to share the room he loves with his grandfather, Peter decides to declare war in an attempt to get it back.

name: His House
summary_text: A refugee couple makes a harrowing escape from war-torn South Sudan, but then they struggle to adjust to their new life in an English town that has an evil lurking beneath the surface.

name: The Lodge
summary_text: A soon-to-be stepmom is snowed in with her fiancé's two children at a remote holiday village. Just as relations begin to thaw between the trio, some strange and frightening events take place.

name: Sicario: Day of the Soldado
summary_text: The drug war on the U.S.-Mexico border has escalated as the cartels have begun trafficking terrorists across the US border. To fight the war, federal agent Matt Graver re-teams with the mercurial Alejandro.

name: Oklahoma!
summary_text: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

name: Slumdog Millionaire
summary_text: A Mumbai teenager reflects on his life after being accused of cheating on the Indian version of "Who Wants to be a Millionaire?".

name: American Gangster
summary_text: An outcast New York City cop is charged with bringing down Harlem drug lord Frank Lucas, whose real life inspired this partly biographical film.

name: Climax
summary_text: French dancers gather in a remote, empty school building to rehearse on a wintry night. The all-night celebration morphs into a hallucinatory nightmare when they learn their sangria is laced with LSD.

name: Persona
summary_text: A man diagnosed with Alzheimer's decides to punish criminals.

name: Pam & Tommy
summary_text: Follows the story of their relationship going back to their whirlwind romance that started with them marrying after only knowing each other for 96 hours in 1995.

name: High-Rise
summary_text: Life for the residents of a tower block begins to run out of control.

name: Papillon
summary_text: Wrongfully convicted for murder, Henri Charriere forms an unlikely relationship with fellow inmate and quirky convicted counterfeiter Louis Dega, in an attempt to escape from the notorious penal colony on Devil's Island.

name: Kingdom
summary_text: A retired MMA fighter turned trainer juggles keeping his mixed martial arts gym running and keeping his family united.

name: The League
summary_text: An ensemble comedy that follows a group of old friends in a fantasy football league who care deeply about one another -- so deeply that they use every opportunity to make each other's lives miserable.

name: The Hunger Games: Mockingjay - Part 2
summary_text: Katniss and a team of rebels from District 13 prepare for the final battle that will decide the fate of Panem.

name: MI-5
summary_text: The missions of MI-5, the UK's domestic intelligence organization.

name: Aladdin
summary_text: A kindhearted street urchin and a power-hungry Grand Vizier vie for a magic lamp that has the power to make their deepest wishes come true.

name: The Lego Movie
summary_text: An ordinary LEGO construction worker, thought to be the prophesied as "special", is recruited to join a quest to stop an evil tyrant from gluing the LEGO universe into eternal stasis.

name: Police Academy
summary_text: A group of good-hearted, but incompetent misfits enter the police academy, but the instructors there are not going to put up with their pranks.

name: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
summary_text: A toon-hating detective is a cartoon rabbit's only hope to prove his innocence when he is accused of murder.

name: Sunshine
summary_text: A team of international astronauts are sent on a dangerous mission to reignite the dying Sun with a nuclear fission bomb in 2057.

name: Summer of Soul (...Or, When the Revolution Could Not Be Televised)
summary_text: Summer Of Soul (...Or, When The Revolution Could Not Be Televised) is a feature documentary about the legendary 1969 Harlem Cultural Festival which celebrated African American music and culture, and promoted Black pride and unity.

name: Shame
summary_text: A sex addict's carefully cultivated private life falls apart after his sister arrives for an indefinite stay.

name: Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt
summary_text: A woman is rescued from a doomsday cult and starts life over again in New York City.

name: The Society
summary_text: When everyone else mysteriously vanishes from their wealthy town, the teen residents of West Ham must forge their own society to survive.

name: This Is the End
summary_text: Six Los Angeles celebrities are stuck in James Franco's house after a series of devastating events just destroyed the city. Inside, the group not only have to face the apocalypse, but themselves.

name: We Can Be Heroes
summary_text: When alien invaders capture the Earth's superheroes, their kids must learn to work together to save their parents- and the planet.

name: Footloose
summary_text: A city teenager moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

name: The Skin I Live In
summary_text: A brilliant plastic surgeon, haunted by past tragedies, creates a type of synthetic skin that withstands any kind of damage. His guinea pig: a mysterious and volatile woman who holds the key to his obsession.

name: Pennyworth
summary_text: The origin story of Alfred Pennyworth, a former special-forces soldier living in London and how he came to work for Bruce Wayne's father.

name: Burlesque
summary_text: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.

name: The Age of Adaline
summary_text: A young woman, born at the turn of the 20th century, is rendered ageless after an accident. After many solitary years, she meets a man who complicates the eternal life she has settled into.

name: Bully
summary_text: A pack of naïve teenagers conspire to murder a mutual friend, whose aggressive demeanor has proved too much.

name: Oldboy
summary_text: Obsessed with vengeance, a man sets out to find out why he was kidnapped and locked into solitary confinement for twenty years without reason.

name: Gilmore Girls: A Year in the Life
summary_text: Set nearly a decade after the finale of the original series, this revival follows Lorelai, Rory and Emily Gilmore through four seasons of change.

name: In the Mood for Love
summary_text: Two neighbors form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

name: One Day
summary_text: After spending the night together on the night of their college graduation Dexter and Emma are shown each year on the same date to see where they are in their lives. They are sometimes together, sometimes not, on that day.

name: War Dogs
summary_text: Loosely based on the true story of two young men, David Packouz and Efraim Diveroli, who won a three hundred million dollar contract from the Pentagon to arm America's allies in Afghanistan.

name: Run Hide Fight
summary_text: 17-year-old Zoe Hull uses her wits, survival skills, and compassion to fight for her life, and those of her fellow classmates, against a group of live-streaming school shooters.

name: Enchanted
summary_text: A young maiden in a land called Andalasia, who is prepared to be wed, is sent away to New York City by an evil Queen, where she falls in love with a lawyer.

name: The House That Jack Built
summary_text: The story follows Jack, a highly intelligent serial killer, over the course of twelve years, and depicts the murders that really develop his inner madman.

name: The Wonder Years
summary_text: Kevin Arnold recalls growing up during the late 60s and early 70s; the turbulent social times make the transition from child to adult unusually interesting.

name: Scream Queens
summary_text: A semi-anthology series that centers on characters being terrorized by a serial killer in different locations, including a university and a hospital.

name: The Boss Baby
summary_text: A suit-wearing, briefcase-carrying baby pairs up with his 7-year old brother to stop the dastardly plot of the CEO of Puppy Co.

name: Land
summary_text: A bereaved woman seeks out a new life, off the grid in Wyoming.

name: Under the Dome
summary_text: An invisible and mysterious force field descends upon a small actual town of Chester's Mill, Maine, USA, trapping residents inside, cut off from the rest of civilization. The trapped townspeople must discover the secrets and purpose of the "dome" or "sphere" and its origins, while coming to learn more than they ever knew about each other and animals too.

name: The Blair Witch Project
summary_text: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

name: Friday
summary_text: It's Friday, and Craig and Smokey must come up with $200 they owe a local bully or there won't be a Saturday.

name: Below Her Mouth
summary_text: An unexpected affair quickly escalates into a heart-stopping reality for two women whose passionate connection changes their lives forever.

name: A Bug's Life
summary_text: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

name: Warcraft
summary_text: As an Orc horde invades the planet Azeroth using a magic portal, a few human heroes and dissenting Orcs must attempt to stop the true evil behind this war.

name: The Karate Kid
summary_text: Work causes a single mother to move to China with her young son; in his new home, the boy embraces kung fu, taught to him by a master.

name: Rain Man
summary_text: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father left a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.

name: Hardball
summary_text: An aimless young man who is scalping tickets, gambling, and drinking, agrees to coach a Little League team from the Cabrini Green housing project in Chicago as a condition of getting a loan from a friend.

name: Bron/Broen
summary_text: When a body is found on the bridge between Denmark and Sweden, right on the border, Danish inspector Martin Rohde and Swedish Saga Norén have to share jurisdiction and work together to find the killer.

name: Law Abiding Citizen
summary_text: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his family's killers free.

name: Wander
summary_text: After getting hired to probe a suspicious death in the small town of Wander, a mentally unstable private investigator becomes convinced the case is linked to the same 'conspiracy cover up' that caused the death of his daughter.

name: Rango
summary_text: Rango is an ordinary chameleon who accidentally winds up in the town of Dirt, a lawless outpost in the Wild West in desperate need of a new sheriff.

name: Sword Art Online
summary_text: In the year 2022, thousands of people get trapped in a new virtual MMORPG and the lone wolf player, Kirito, works to escape.

name: Lawless
summary_text: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a trio of bootlegging brothers are threatened by a new special deputy and other authorities angling for a cut of their profits.

name: Deepwater Horizon
summary_text: A dramatization of the disaster in April 2010, when the offshore drilling rig called the Deepwater Horizon exploded, resulting in the worst oil spill in American history.

name: The Others
summary_text: A woman who lives in her darkened old family house with her two photosensitive children becomes convinced that the home is haunted.

name: The Sweetest Thing
summary_text: A girl finds she is forced to educate herself on the etiquette of wooing the opposite sex when she finally meets Mr. Right.

name: Collateral Beauty
summary_text: Retreating from life after a tragedy, a man questions the universe by writing to Love, Time, and Death. Receiving unexpected answers, he begins to see how these things interlock and how even loss can reveal moments of meaning and beauty.

name: CODA
summary_text: As a CODA (Child of Deaf Adults) Ruby is the only hearing person in her deaf family. When the family's fishing business is threatened, Ruby finds herself torn between pursuing her love of music and her fear of abandoning her parents.

name: Babylon Berlin
summary_text: Colognian commissioner Gereon Rath moves to Berlin, the epicenter of political and social changes in the Golden Twenties.

name: Happy Valley
summary_text: Yorkshire based crime drama centering on the personal and professional life of Police Sergeant Catherine Cawood.

name: Harlots
summary_text: Brothel owner Margaret Wells struggles to raise her daughters in London during the 18th century.

name: Irresistible
summary_text: A Democratic strategist helps a retired veteran run for mayor in a small, conservative Midwest town.

name: The Wrestler
summary_text: A faded professional wrestler must retire, but finds his quest for a new life outside the ring a dispiriting struggle.

name: Bleach
summary_text: High school student Ichigo Kurosaki, who has the ability to see ghosts, gains soul reaper powers from Rukia Kuchiki and sets out to save the world from "Hollows".

name: Ghosts
summary_text: A group of spirits restlessly squabble in an abandoned country home.

name: Steven Universe
summary_text: A team of intergalactic warriors fights to protect the universe, but the combination of three highly trained beings and one quirky young boy leaves the team struggling to overcome the dangerous scenarios that are put in front of them.

name: Hostel
summary_text: Three backpackers head to a Slovak city that promises to meet their hedonistic expectations, with no idea of the hell that awaits them.

name: Peter Pan
summary_text: The Darling family children receive a visit from Peter Pan, who takes them to Never Never Land where an ongoing war with the evil Pirate Captain Hook is taking place.

name: The World's End
summary_text: Five friends who reunite in an attempt to top their epic pub crawl from twenty years earlier unwittingly become humanity's only hope for survival.

name: The Holiday
summary_text: Two women troubled with guy-problems swap homes in each other's countries, where they each meet a local guy and fall in love.

name: Silence
summary_text: In the 17th century, two Portuguese Jesuit priests travel to Japan in an attempt to locate their mentor, who is rumored to have committed apostasy, and to propagate Catholicism.

name: Bunk'd
summary_text: Emma, Ravi, and Zuri Ross head off to a rustic summer camp in Maine, where their parents met as teens. Along with their new friends, love triangle, and the fears of the camp, the trio tries their best to settle into their exciting and challenging new lives at Camp Kikiwaka.

name: Can You Keep a Secret?
summary_text: Thinking they're about to crash, Emma spills her secrets to a stranger on a plane. At least, she thought he was a stranger...Until she later meets Jack, her company's young CEO, who now knows every humiliating detail about her. Based on the blockbuster NYT bestseller.

name: Conan the Barbarian
summary_text: A young boy, Conan, becomes a slave after his parents are killed and tribe destroyed by a savage warlord and sorcerer, Thulsa Doom. When he grows up he becomes a fearless, invincible fighter. Set free, he plots revenge against Thulsa Doom.

name: X-Men: The Last Stand
summary_text: The human government develops a cure for mutations, and Jean Gray becomes a darker uncontrollable persona called the Phoenix who allies with Magneto, causing escalation into an all-out battle for the X-Men.

name: General Hospital
summary_text: Families, friends, enemies, and lovers experience life-changing events in the large upstate city of Port Charles, New York, which has a busy hospital, upscale hotel, cozy diner, and dangerous waterfront frequented by the criminal underworld.

name: The L Word: Generation Q
summary_text: Bette Porter, Shane McCutcheon, and Alice Pieszecki intermingle with a younger generation of Los Angelenos experiencing love, heartbreak, sex, setbacks, and success.

name: Warrior Nun
summary_text: After waking up in a morgue, an orphaned teen discovers she now possesses superpowers as the chosen Halo Bearer for a secret sect of demon-hunting nuns.

name: Seven Samurai
summary_text: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.

name: The Hurt Locker
summary_text: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.

name: American Graffiti
summary_text: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.

name: Another Life
summary_text: Astronaut Niko Breckenridge and her young crew face unimaginable danger as they go on a high-risk mission to explore the genesis of an alien artifact.

name: Citizen Kane
summary_text: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'.

name: Mystic Pizza
summary_text: Three teenage girls come of age while working at a pizza parlor in the Connecticut town of Mystic.

name: Red Dragon
summary_text: A retired FBI agent with psychological gifts is assigned to help track down "The Tooth Fairy", a mysterious serial killer. Aiding him is imprisoned forensic psychiatrist Dr. Hannibal "The Cannibal" Lecter.

name: Dora and the Lost City of Gold
summary_text: Dora, a teenage explorer, leads her friends on an adventure to save her parents and solve the mystery behind a lost city of gold.

name: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3
summary_text: Plot unknown. Third installment of the 'Guardians of the Galaxy' franchise.

name: Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief
summary_text: A teenager discovers he's the descendant of a Greek god and sets out on an adventure to settle an on-going battle between the gods.

name: Legend
summary_text: A young man must stop the Lord of Darkness from destroying daylight and marrying the woman he loves.

name: The Shannara Chronicles
summary_text: Series of adventures, war, and evil that occur throughout the history of the Four Lands.

name: Resident Evil Village
summary_text: Ethan Winters' world suddenly comes crashing down when Chris Redfield's appearance sets off a chain of events that ultimately leads him to a mysterious village.

name: Life in a Year
summary_text: The movie follows 17-year-old Daryn who finds out that his girlfriend is dying. He sets out to give her an entire life in the last year she has left.

name: As Above, So Below
summary_text: When a team of explorers ventures into the catacombs that lie beneath the streets of Paris, they uncover the dark secret that lies within this city of the dead.

name: Oz the Great and Powerful
summary_text: A small-time magician is swept away to an enchanted land and is forced into a power struggle between three witches.

name: The Gifted
summary_text: In a world where mutated humans are treated with distrust and fear, an institute for mutants battles to achieve peaceful co-existence with humanity.

name: Tarzan
summary_text: A man raised by gorillas must decide where he really belongs when he discovers he is a human.

name: Sacred Games
summary_text: A link in their pasts leads an honest cop to a fugitive gang boss, whose cryptic warning spurs the officer on a quest to save Mumbai from cataclysm.

name: In Plain Sight
summary_text: A three part TV miniseries about Lanarkshire's Detective William Muncie and his quest to bring to justice notorious killer Peter Manuel.

name: Once Upon a Time in the West
summary_text: A mysterious stranger with a harmonica joins forces with a notorious desperado to protect a beautiful widow from a ruthless assassin working for the railroad.

name: The Last Samurai
summary_text: An American military advisor embraces the Samurai culture he was hired to destroy after he is captured in battle.

name: Survivor
summary_text: A reality show where a group of contestants are stranded in a remote location with little more than the clothes on their back. The lone survivor of this contest takes home a million dollars.

name: Homefront
summary_text: A former DEA agent moves his family to a quiet town, where he soon tangles with a local meth druglord.

name: Thir13en Ghosts
summary_text: When Cyrus Kriticos, a very rich collector of unique things, dies, he leaves house and fortune to his nephew and his family. While they're inside, they find they are not alone.

name: The Princess and the Frog
summary_text: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

name: Logan Lucky
summary_text: Two brothers attempt to pull off a heist during a NASCAR race in North Carolina.

name: Hairspray
summary_text: Pleasantly plump teenager Tracy Turnblad teaches 1962 Baltimore a thing or two about integration after landing a spot on a local TV dance show.

name: Witnesses
summary_text: For nearly 200 years, skeptics and critics have been trying to explain away what many Book of Mormon witnesses stated-that they had seen angels and hefted golden metal plates containing ancient inscriptions.

name: Savages
summary_text: Pot growers Ben and Chon face off against the Mexican drug cartel who kidnapped their shared girlfriend.

name: Roadrunner: A Film About Anthony Bourdain
summary_text: A documentary about Anthony Bourdain and his career as a chef, writer and host, revered and renowned for his authentic approach to food, culture and travel.

name: Dark Waters
summary_text: A corporate defense attorney takes on an environmental lawsuit against a chemical company that exposes a lengthy history of pollution.

name: Friday Night Dinner
summary_text: Two siblings share their Friday-night dinners at their parents' home and, somehow, something always goes wrong.

name: American Made
summary_text: The story of Barry Seal, an American pilot who became a drug-runner for the CIA in the 1980s in a clandestine operation that would be exposed as the Iran-Contra Affair.

name: Crazy Ex-Girlfriend
summary_text: A young woman abandons a choice job at a law firm and her life in New York in an attempt to find happiness in the unlikely locale of West Covina, California.

name: MILF
summary_text: Three best friends in their forties start a relationship with younger men while on vacation.

name: Saved by the Bell
summary_text: A close-knit group of six friends get through their teens together while attending Bayside High School in Palisades, California.

name: The Hills Have Eyes
summary_text: A family falls victim to a group of mutated cannibals in a desert far away from civilization.

name: The Room
summary_text: Johnny is a successful bank executive who lives quietly in a San Francisco townhouse with his fiancée, Lisa. One day, putting aside any scruple, she seduces Johnny's best friend, Mark. From there, nothing will be the same again.

name: A Series of Unfortunate Events
summary_text: When a massive fire kills their parents, three children are delivered to the custody of cousin and stage actor Count Olaf, who is secretly plotting to steal their parents' vast fortune.

name: Identity
summary_text: Stranded at a desolate Nevada motel during a nasty rain storm, ten strangers become acquainted with each other when they realize that they're being killed off one by one.

name: The Croods
summary_text: After their cave is destroyed, a caveman family must trek through an unfamiliar fantastical world with the help of an inventive boy.

name: A Walk to Remember
summary_text: The story of two North Carolina teens, Landon Carter and Jamie Sullivan, who are thrown together after Landon gets into trouble and is made to do community service.

name: Sleepover
summary_text: Desperate to improve their social status, four best friends enter into an all-night scavenger hunt against the popular clique in their school.

name: I, Robot
summary_text: In 2035, a technophobic cop investigates a crime that may have been perpetrated by a robot, which leads to a larger threat to humanity.

name: Bloodshot
summary_text: Ray Garrison, a slain soldier, is re-animated with superpowers.

name: Little Shop of Horrors
summary_text: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

name: The Green Inferno
summary_text: A group of student activists travels to the Amazon to save the rain forest and soon discover that they are not alone, and that no good deed goes unpunished.

name: Blossom
summary_text: A teenage girl living in a house run by men dreams what life would be like if she lived in a more conventional family.

name: Hachi: A Dog's Tale
summary_text: A college professor bonds with an abandoned dog he takes into his home.

name: The Expendables
summary_text: A CIA operative hires a team of mercenaries to eliminate a Latin dictator and a renegade CIA agent.

name: I Saw the Devil
summary_text: A secret agent exacts revenge on a serial killer through a series of captures and releases.

name: Rambo: Last Blood
summary_text: Rambo must confront his past and unearth his ruthless combat skills to exact revenge in a final mission.

name: Last Tango in Paris
summary_text: A young Parisian woman meets a middle-aged American businessman who demands their clandestine relationship be based only on sex.

name: Guns Akimbo
summary_text: A guy relies on his newly-acquired gladiator skills to save his ex-girlfriend from kidnappers.

name: The Faculty
summary_text: When Casey Connor, Herrington High School's newspaper photographer, witnesses the murder of a nurse and sees her alive again, she decides to investigate the bizarre happenings.

name: Mile 22
summary_text: A small team of elite American intelligence officers, part of a top-secret tactical command unit, try to smuggle a mysterious police officer with sensitive information out of Indonesia.

name: Pinocchio
summary_text: A darker version of the classic children's fairy tale of a wooden puppet that transforms into a real living boy.

name: Santa Clarita Diet
summary_text: Sheila and Joel are married real estate agents in Santa Clarita, California. When Sheila dies, their lives take a dark turn.

name: Princess Mononoke
summary_text: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

name: Night Walk
summary_text: In this modern-day Romeo and Juliet, star-crossed lovers are torn apart by cultural tensions between the East and the West. Sarah takes her American boyfriend Frank to her home country in the Arab world. After an incident during a night stroll, Frank is imprisoned by corrupt police for Sarah's murder. His quest for justice turns into a spiritual journey led by Muslim inmates, from the moderate ...                See full summary »

name: RocknRolla
summary_text: When a Russian mobster orchestrates a crooked land deal, millions of dollars are up for grabs, drawing in the entire London underworld into a feeding frenzy at a time when the old criminal regime is losing turf to a wealthy foreign mob.
